education: Wei Li graduated from Wuhan University of Technology(WHUT) in 2015. Now, she is a PH.D. candidate in Embedded and Pervasive Computing Lab of Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST), China.
research_interest: Pervasive Computing, The Internet of things, Edge Computing, Cognitive Computing, etc
hobbies: Playing billiards and badminton, reading and so on.
